jPokémon: The Pokémon API

Provides well-documented data structures and utilities for Pokémon games written in Java.
Overview  Package   Class  Use 
 PREV CLASS   NEXT CLASS FRAMES    NO FRAMES

org.jpokemon.pmapi.type
Class PokemonType

java.lang.Object
  org.jpokemon.pmapi.type.PokemonType
Direct Known Subclasses:
TypelessType
public class PokemonType
extends Object

Defines a Pokémon type (such as Grass or Dark). For convenience, the classic 17 types are instantiated by the ClassicTypes class.

Note that this class will try to register itself with the manager as soon as setName is called, so that it will have a name to register under.

Since:
Alpha
Author:
Atheriel
See Also:
TypeManager, ClassicTypes
